The Fire Stick is streaming great for us thus far and, being plugged into the back of our tv, it's out of sight of our kids, an added bonus! Very happy with the puchase.

review: Ever thought "I wish I could figure out how to get my Amazon Prime on my TV"??  Well, wonder no more! I am clueless about anything electronic so I was leery about getting this; but I am SO glad I did!  I got this; plugged it into the side of the TV and 20 minutes later (and for the next week) we watched all 32 episodes of Season 1 Andy Griffith on our big screen tv!SO glad I found it and SO glad for honest reviewers who convinced me I was smart enough to figure it out!Highly recommend to anyone wanting to make their tv a "Smart TV"  or to watch enhanced viewing of Prime (or You Tube or the other sites).
author: Karen
